Articles.Content:
Since I thought this forum needed a thread about information regarding plastic model kits and figurines, I made this thread. So, feel free to discuss. For this is most certainly a topic that will not be offensive.

Edited August 24, 2014 by DJEN

I make model tanks because I am crazy about tanks, mostly 1/35 scale, I have an: IS-2, Centurion Mk3, VK4502 Vorne, Churchill Mk7, Jagdtiger, Panther, Sherman Firefly, Shermans of various assortments, Jgpanthers, Sherman Recovery Vehicle (Custom Built), Panzer 3 Ausf L, Panzer 3 Ausf N, Tiger.
I'm a tabletop wargamer so I've got hundreds of the little buggers. Probably not painted to anywhere near collector standard though...

This counts, right?

That's Armin Arlert from Attack on Titan in Nendoroid form, for those interested. He's pretty awesome.

In other notes, I used to play 40K. The lore is really quite good, I never got round to playing much though.
